page.title: 13Kirkton Farm.
page.content: Kirkton Farm is on the N.W.side of Cowdenbeath near the B917 road leading from Cowdenbeath to Kelty.The farm cottage is opposite what used to be the manse for Kirkford church.My uncle works on the farm which has cows and pigs,a few ducks and chickens and about 30 sheep.My uncle's job is working on the tractors,moving the hay and manure around the farm and taking hay to other farms.The farmer sometimes gives my uncle a few eggs to take home.The farmer owns two collies which he uses to round up the sheep and a cat to keep away the rats and mice.
